All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountStatus
    Represents the operational status of a bank account.
    AccountStatusException
    Exception thrown when an operation is attempted on an account that is not in an appropriate status for that operation.
    Bank
    Manages a collection of bank accounts with persistence and scheduled interest services.
    BankAccount
    Abstract base class representing a bank account.
    BankApp
    Main application class demonstrating the banking system functionality.
    CentralBank
    Singleton class representing the central bank that sets the default interest rate.
    CheckingAccount
    A checking account with overdraft protection.
    InsufficientFundsException
    Exception thrown when an account has insufficient funds for a transaction.
    InvalidAmountException
    Exception thrown when an invalid transaction amount is provided.
    InvalidCredentialsException  
    SavingsAccount
    A savings account that earns interest and requires a positive balance.
    Transaction
    Represents an immutable transaction record in a bank account.
    TransactionType
    Represents the type of a banking transaction.
    User
    Represents a user with credentials and a linked bank account.
    UserStatusException
